page.title: 06KNOWLE HILL HOUSE,OXSHOTT
page.content: Knowle Hill House was built by Mr.Cook in the middle of the 19th Century.It is now in a bad state of repair and about to fall down.It is being reconstructed,eventually to become the {Welcome Foundation}(headquarters for this pharmaceutical company) It is made of plaster to look like stone. It's stone-mullioned,with sash windows. The front of the house is approximately 75 yards long,2 storeys high,with rooms in the attic. There are barns,cottages,stables and a lodge in the grounds,all needing renovation.
